title: How much fees will get deducted in an Aakash medical 2 years integrated course as I have got 70% scholarship in the ANTHE 2018-19? - Quora

response.answer_text: The scholarship awarded in ANTHE applies to obly tuition fee. So you have to pay complete registration fee, admission fee and 30% of the tuition fee. Additionally you can avail other discounts like the early bird discount, ex-aakashian discount etc. Contact the nearest branch. They will calculate and give you exact amount payable.
